sentences.en: ...an investigation into children's understanding and appreciation of art.
sentences.cn: …关于孩子对艺术的理解与欣赏的一个调查。

sentences.en: an aesthetic appreciation of the landscape
sentences.cn: 用审美的眼光欣赏风景
布赖恩吹口哨以示赞赏。

sentences.en: He was presented with a watch in appreciation of his long service.
sentences.cn: 他获赠一块手表，作为对其长期服务的感谢。

sentences.en: I had written an appreciation of Hernandez for a magazine.
sentences.cn: 我为一家杂志社写过一篇评论埃尔南德斯的文章。

sentences.en: I have now developed an appreciation of poetry.
I'll be sending them a donation in appreciation of their help.
sentences.cn: 我将送给他们一笔捐款以感谢他们的帮助.

sentences.en: It helps children to develop an appreciation of poetry and literature.
sentences.cn: 这有助于培养小孩子对诗歌和文学作品的欣赏力。

sentences.en: Mr Walsh has a keen appreciation of the priorities of the electorate.
sentences.cn: 沃尔什先生深刻理解选民最为关注的事项。

sentences.en: She gazed in appreciation at the scene.
She had no appreciation of the difficulties we were facing.
sentences.cn: 她不了解我们所面临的困难.

sentences.en: She shows little appreciation of good music.
sentences.cn: 她感受不到美好音乐的妙处。

sentences.en: Show your appreciation by little acts of kindness.
sentences.cn: 通过点滴善行来表达你的谢意.

sentences.en: The course aims to develop the children's appreciation of music in performance.
sentences.cn: 该课程旨在培养孩子欣赏音乐演奏的能力.

sentences.en: They have a stronger appreciation of the importance of economic incentives.
sentences.cn: 他们对经济激励的重要性有了更深的理解。

sentences.en: This absolutist belief is replaced by an appreciation that rules can vary.
sentences.cn: 这种绝对主义的信念被规则可以变通这一认识所替代。

sentences.en: We offer this small token by way of appreciation.
sentences.cn: 我们赠送这小小的礼物以表谢意.

sentences.en: You have to take capital appreciation of the property into account.
sentences.cn: 你必须将该处房产的资本增值考虑在内。

words.tran_cn: 感激的；赏识的；有欣赏力的；承认有价值的

phrases.tran_cn: 股票升值，存货升值；库存增值

trans.tran_cn: 欣赏，鉴定，感谢，领会，体谅，同情，认识，升值，评论
trans.tran_en: pleasure you feel when you realize something is good, useful, or well done
